summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3352 for the improvement of The Alley between Boylston Avenue North and Franklin Avenue North, from East Newton Street to East Lynn Street, being the alley in Blocks 1 and 10, Greene's Addition; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41372, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
